name: JoinUI
author: Asraye
description: Add a Join UI into Revite natively, in the create server section

name: PopoutMP4
author: Asraye
description: Adds a widget for MP4s to which you can pop them out and watch them anywhere on the platform

name: Masquerade
author: LazyCat2
description: A revolt plugin that makes you able to use masquerade.

name: Emoji Packs
author: LazyCat2
description: Create and share emoji packs. Use emojis without joining server with them.

name: Sanitizer
author: LazyCat2
description: Removes zalgo from user content (messages, usernames, etc) and replaces unicode letters with ascii

name: Survive on mobile
author: LazyCat2
description: A revolt plugin that makes you able to use console in mobile and get notified about any error/warning.
